# Support

## Getting Help

Before opening an issue, please check these resources:

### Documentation
- **[README](../README.md)** - Installation, usage examples, and feature overview
- **[Contributing Guide](../CONTRIBUTING.md)** - Development setup and contribution guidelines
- **[Examples](../examples/)** - Comprehensive demos and real-world examples
- **[Architecture Docs](../docs/)** - Technical specifications and architecture decisions

### Community
- **[GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/oocx/tfplan2md/discussions)** - Ask questions, share ideas, and discuss features
  - **Q&A** - Get help with usage and troubleshooting
  - **Feature Ideas** - Suggest and discuss new features
  - **General** - General discussion about tfplan2md
  - **Show and Tell** - Share your tfplan2md use cases and reports

### Existing Issues
- **[Search existing issues](https://github.com/oocx/tfplan2md/issues)** - Your question might already be answered
- **[Check closed issues](https://github.com/oocx/tfplan2md/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aclosed)** - Past issues may contain solutions

## Reporting Bugs

Found a bug? Please [open an issue](https://github.com/oocx/tfplan2md/issues/new/choose) with:
- Clear description of the problem
- Steps to reproduce
- Expected vs actual behavior
- Your environment (OS, .NET version, Docker version)
- Sample Terraform plan JSON (if possible)

Use the **Bug Report** template for structured information.

## Requesting Features

Have an idea for improvement? Please:
1. **Check [GitHub Discussions - Feature Ideas](https://github.com/oocx/tfplan2md/discussions/categories/feature-ideas)** - Discuss the idea first
2. **Search existing feature requests** - Someone may have already requested it
3. **Open a feature request** using the template if the idea gains support

## Security Vulnerabilities

**Do not open public issues for security vulnerabilities.**

Please see our [Security Policy](../SECURITY.md) for instructions on responsible disclosure.

## Response Times

This is a hobby project maintained outside regular work hours. Please be patient:
- **Critical bugs**: Addressed as soon as possible
- **Feature requests**: Evaluated based on project goals and maintainer availability
- **Questions**: Community help via Discussions is encouraged

## Code of Conduct

Please follow our [Code of Conduct](../CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md) in all interactions.

## Contact

For private inquiries not suitable for public discussion:
- **Email**: tfplan2md@outofcoffeeexception.de
